mods.abstract: Performance of Philosophy, as performed by an unidentified group of performers with piano accompaniment. Words and music by Oakley Haldeman, "Teepee" Mitchell, and Lew Porter.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
